editorialNotes.standard: There’s only one thing easier than visiting your local library: bringing it to you. Simply link your library card and log in to freely access ebooks, audiobooks and magazines.
editorialNotes.short: ‣ For readers, Libby allows you to check out books from your local library—directly on your iPad.
